channel.title: [Class Suggestion] Pixie (Neutral)
channel.description:
**Pixie** (Neutral) - A chaotic loon who only exists to have fun and cause trouble.
----
**Please note:** This is based on a defunct previous suggestion but is substantially changed. I've created it _specifically to be fun to play and mess with people_. So naturally, it's trolly and annoying.
----
Passive: **Fairy Glamour** - Players who investigate you will be given their own investigative results. (King sees you as his faction, Princess sees info as if she checked another Princess, etc.)
Day Ability 1: **Wabba-Whack** - Cast a spell on a target player, causing a random daytime effect that would otherwise belong to a different class. (4 uses.) Low chance of: Poison/Bleeding (Depending on faction in round.) Medium chance of: Distract High chance of: Troll Box
Day Ability 2: **Puzzle Box** - The player you select will see others’ messages as gibberish for the next 10 seconds. (4 uses.)
Example: _PlayerName: 8 is cult._ Becomes: _PlayerName: 8 bs flod._
Night Ability 1: **Warped Mirror** - Redirect the selected player to target themselves. (Unlimited use. Of course this DOES NOT include obviously broken things like Prince’s execution.)
Night Ability 2: **Transmute** - You may choose to permanently take the class of a dead Neutral player if you so choose. Usable after 5 days. (Single use. Effect is permanent.)
----
**Goal:** Survive (like Alchemist) while having as much fun at others' expense as possible. ;) If you choose to change classes, your goal changes to that of the class you chose -- of course.
